div.h1:
It could be you, or it could be us, but there's no page at
https://www.albanyoregon.gov/index.php?option=com_xmap&view=xml&tmpl=component&id=1

span.strong: We recently moved to albanyoregon.gov. Some of our old links are no longer active.

div.br:
For example, www.cityofalbany.net/departments/police is now just albanyoregon.gov/police.
(Please update your bookmarks. Thank you.)

div.h5:
Main: 541-917-7500
Police non-emergency: 541-917-7680
Public Works Operations: 541-917-7600
Other: Directory
TTY: 711
Email: Contact form
Social: Other...
div.h6: Most City offices and facilities are open Monday-Friday, 8am–5pm, individual service counter hours vary.
Official website of the City of Albany, Oregon; all rights reserved. Terms & Conditions
